sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- The form template -->
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
  props: ['id'],
  data() {
    return {
      event: null,
      errorMessage: ''
    };
  },
  created() {
    axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/api/events/${this.id}`)
      .then(response => {
        this.event = response.data;
      })
      .catch(error => {
        console.error('Error fetching event data:', error);
        this.errorMessage = 'Failed to load event data.';
      });
  },
  methods: {
    updateEvent() {
      axios.put(`http://localhost:3000/api/events/${this.id}`, this.event)
        .then(() => { // Remove `response` since it's not used
          alert('Event updated successfully!');
          this.$router.push('/'); // Redirect to the event list after a successful update
        })
        .catch(error => {
          console.error('Error updating event:', error);
          this.errorMessage = 'Failed to update the event.';
        });
    }
  }
};
</script>
